articles.content: Dr. Randeep Wadhawan, HOD - Department of Minimal Access Surgery, Bariatric & Metabolic, and Gastrointestinal Surgery, Manipal Hospital, Dwarka says, “If you are overweight, with a BMI above 25 k… [+611 chars]
